main: Standard Heishou mechanic: Using S3 or defense gives a 3 turn buff corresponding to their Heishou Pack. {status:SnakeStance} which gives her a passive {status:Breath} generation per turn and gives her additional {status:Breath} Potency generation when using skills against enemies with {status:Burst}.
Standard Heishou mechanic: Combos with {identity:10613}'s S3. The buff gives him {status:Burst} application on crit (3 per turn).
S2 and S3 both get Coin reuses based on {status:Breath}, with the S2 gaining it at 30+ Potency by consuming 10 and the S3 gaining it on crit with her last coin.
S3 is an {status:WideAreaRampage} with atk weight 3, which means it picks 2 targets along with its main target, then each coin on her attack will choose a random target from the 3 to hit.
other: {status:SnakeStance} gives her additional {status:Burst} application on her S1 and Clash Power on her S3. Her S2's final coin also lets her generate an extra stack of the buff on crit.

S2 inflicts {status:BurstPoison} which applies {status:AttackDown} and {status:DefenseDown} on the enemy whenever their {status:Burst} stack is triggered by a crit up to 5 times. When the debuff is fully consumed, it deals additional {keyword:Gluttony} damage based on the enemy's {status:Burst} Potency.
Her passive increases her damage dealt slightly when she has {status:SnakeStance} or if the enemy has {status:BurstPoison}

1091201.desc:
If this unit has [SnakeStance], deal +5% damage
If target has [BurstPoison], deal +5% damage
1091201.name: Heishou Mutation [Si]

1091221.desc: When 1 ally with the fastest Speed inflicts [Burst] damage to an enemy, inflict 1 [AttackDown] and 1 [DefenseDown] next turn (once per turn)
1091221.name: Intravascular Venom
